resources.string: Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history

Hello fellow time waster! Corey Kraft here, project manager. I am sure you are dying to hear all about my personal life because you love our app so much. I am sure you would love to hear all about how I like long walks on the beach with my pug and listening to Norman Connors vinyls while I sip a slightly above bottom shelf scotch and indulge in some classic mid century litterature... but I am not going to tell you any of that. You see my pug hates sand, and I am not sure I am crazy about you being all up in my business. Why are you even still reading this? Go! Go play! hahaha GO!

David Donovan: Architectural Manager I like to play games, draw diagrams, and I am an avid animal lover. This semester we were tasked with the fun task of making solitaire and I learned a lot about my task as Architect and Design. It was a trip but was very worth while.

Hello, my name is Kaleb and I am the Quality Assurance Manager. My role in this application is based on testing purposes. Testing the code, debugging, and running the application as a whole to determine its functionality runs as needed for users. On a side note, I am a senior at the University of Tennessee at Chattanooga and my major is computer science with a concentration in information security.
Nicole Avans: Development Manager I dont care what is written about me, so long as it isnt true. - Dorothy Parker

A recent survey was conducted of user satisfaction with various commercially available computer card games. Based on user feedback, we decided there was an opportunity to develop such a game to address the dissatisfaction/preferences of a sizable group of players.
